ingredients.ingredient: 1 clove garlic, minced, or more to taste
1 (17.6 ounce) container full fat plain Greek yogurt

cookingTips: Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess moisture to prevent watery tzatziki
Use full-fat Greek yogurt for authentic creamy texture
Prepare ahead and refrigerate for flavors to meld before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through making refreshing Greek tzatziki with proper cucumber preparation. Emphasize the importance of removing excess moisture and using quality Greek yogurt.
